about_the_game:
Curse of Blood is an asymmetric confrontation game with vampire and werewolf themes. The story takes place in the magical world of the Middle Ages, where players need to complete the purification of the End Tower to prevent the arrival of the Blood Moon

Human camp: The camp with the highest number of players in the beginning, and different professions have their own professional skills,
Victory condition: Complete the purification of the final tower before the arrival of the Blood Moon.
Vampire Faction: At the beginning, two random players will be selected as Vampire Believers. Believers will have additional Vampire Faction skills while possessing their own professional skills; In the believer state, you can transform, lose your professional skills after transformation, and replace them with more powerful vampire faction skills.
Victory condition: Prevent humans from purifying the terminal tower or killing everyone!
Werewolf faction: At the beginning, a random player will be selected as a werewolf follower, who will have additional werewolf faction skills while possessing their own professional skills; In a believer state, you can transform, lose your professional skills after transformation, and replace them with more powerful werewolf faction skills.
Victory condition: Kill everyone!

Players gather materials, synthesize props on the workbench, and use more powerful props for their next exploration; The methods of collecting materials include opening boxes, killing monsters, and so on.


Of course, you can also kill other players and plunder their props!

As the night of Blood Moon approaches, the wild will continue to lose SAN at night. When the SAN value drops below zero, it will continue to lose blood. As the night of Blood Moon approaches, the speed of losing SAN will also become faster and faster.


Churches and torches will restore SAN values, and certain skills can also be used.
